definition: A garment typically worn by women, often made of a lightweight fabric and featuring a loose-fitting design. It is commonly used as a top or blouse, often paired with skirts or pants for casual or formal occasions.

examples.german: Sie hat eine schöne Bluse gekauft.
Die Bluse passt gut zu der Hose.
examples.english: The blouse goes well with the pants.

examples.german: Ich habe eine neue Bluse im Geschäft gesehen.
examples.english: I saw a new blouse in the store.
